meanings.definition: A type of food consisting of ingredients rolled up inside a tortilla or other flatbread.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I enjoyed delicious rollups filled with veggies and cheese.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone loved the tasty chicken rollups.
meanings.sent3: The rollups were so good, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her homemade rollups were like little flavor bombs.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rollups looked like edible rainbows.

meanings.definition: The act of rolling something up.
meanings.sent1: His quick rollups of the dough impressed the chef.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated the proper technique for rollups in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The rollups of the carpet made it easier to move furniture.
meanings.sent4: The rollups of the waves on the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The rollups of the film reel signaled the end of the movie.

meanings.definition: A summary or compilation of information presented in a rolled-up format.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out rollups of the lesson for easy reference.
meanings.sent2: I always carry rollups of important documents in my bag.
meanings.sent3: The rollups of the meeting notes were surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The rollups of data revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent5: His presentation included colorful rollups of key points.
